Source code for modalic.storage.store

from typing import Optional, Dict
import io
from minio import Minio
from minio.error import S3Error


[docs]class Storage():
    r"""Instantiate Storage Object that enables access to S3 layer.

        Args
        ------------------------------------------------------------
        cfg (dict): dictionary containing the configurations.
        client (minio.Minio): s3 client object.
    """
    def __init__(self, cfg):
        self.cfg = cfg
        self.client = Minio(endpoint=cfg['s3_server'],
                            access_key=cfg['access_key'],
                            secret_key=cfg['secret_access_key'],
                            secure=False)


[docs]    def upload(self,
               object,
               object_name: str,
               length: int = -1,
               metadata: Optional[Dict] = None):
        r"""Uploads data object to s3 storage bucket."""
        self.client.put_object(self.cfg['bucket'], object_name, object, length=length, metadata=metadata)



[docs]    def create_bucket(self):
        r"""Instantiates and creates new bucket where all the object will be stored."""
        pass
